landing.welcome: Create and manage your travel agency here
landing.subtitle: Optimize your operations, elevate customer experiences, and manage every aspect of your agency seamlessly
landing.whyChooseDescription: Aviafy is an all-in-one platform designed specifically for touristic agencies or tour operators. We provide powerful tools for agents or operators to efficiently handle customer requests, manage orders, and oversee financial processes - all in a user-friendly platform.
landing.howItWorksDescription: At Aviafy, we understand the unique challenges of managing a tourist agency. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve developed a comprehensive platform to simplify your workflow and help you focus on what truly matters ‚Äì delivering unforgettable travel experiences!
landing.centralizedDashboard: Centralized Dashboard: Access all your bookings, customers, and financial data in one place.
landing.automationTools: Automation Tools: Save time and reduce errors with automated invoicing, notifications, and data collection.
landing.scalableCustomizable: Scalable & Customizable: Our platform grows with your business, adapting to your needs as you expand.
landing.startManaging: Start managing your Tourism agency with ease.
landing.simpleRecording: Simple Recording: Easily record customer names along with their travel preferences.
landing.organizedData: Organized Data: Keep all customer information centralized for quick access and better service.
landing.agents: Agents: Create and manage your own orders seamlessly.
landing.attachTickets: Attach purchased tickets or travel documents directly to orders.
landing.professionalInvoices: Professional Invoices: Generate customized invoices branded with your agency's details.
landing.sendInvoices: Send Invoices: Send invoices directly to customers via email with a click.
landing.accessData: Access all your bookings, customers, and financial data in one place.
landing.trackExpenses: Track Expenses in Real-Time: Keep an eye on your agency‚Äôs expenses with detailed reports and insights.
landing.calculateSalaries: Calculate employee salaries: calculate employee salaries right on the platform.
landing.chatbotDescription: Designed to take your customer service to the next level, our AI-powered chatbot offers incredible benefits that will transform the way you manage your travel agency:
landing.customerSupport: 24/7 Customer Support: The Aviafy ChatBot is always on, ready to assist your customers anytime, anywhere. No more waiting for support ‚Äì just instant answers and seamless service.
landing.dataCollection: Effortless Data Collection: Let the chatbot gather all essential customer information for you. Names, contact details, and travel preferences are stored and organized automatically, making it easy to provide personalized service.
landing.automatedNotifications: Automated Notifications: Keep everyone in the loop with real-time updates. From booking confirmations to payment reminders, our chatbot ensures that customers and agents never miss a beat.
landing.connectAnywhere: Connect Anywhere: Integrated with platforms like Facebook Messenger and WhatsApp, the Aviafy ChatBot lets you reach customers wherever they are. Engage with them through their preferred channels, making communication effortless.
landing.freeAndScalable: Free and Scalable: The best part? Aviafy ChatBot is absolutely FREE for all users! Plus, as your business grows, our chatbot scales with you, handling an increasing number of customer interactions without additional costs.
landing.saveTime: Save time, reduce costs, and provide exceptional service with the Aviafy ChatBot. üöÄ
landing.centralizedManagement: Centralized Management: Manage all aspects of your agency from one intuitive dashboard. Access bookings, customer profiles, invoices, and financial data without switching between multiple tools.
landing.enhancedEfficiency: Enhanced Efficiency: Automate routine tasks like invoicing, data entry, and notifications. Save time and reduce human error, allowing your team to focus on providing exceptional service to your clients.
landing.customerSupport24: 24/7 Customer Support: With the Aviafy Chat Bot, offer round-the-clock support to your customers. Handle inquiries, collect data, and assist with bookings anytime, anywhere, without the need for additional staff.
landing.logTrackBookings: Quickly log and track customer bookings: Attach travel documents and itineraries directly to each order, keeping everything organized and easy to access.
landing.realTimeFinancialOversight: Real-Time Financial Oversight: Keep a close eye on your agency‚Äôs financial health with real-time expense tracking and detailed reports. Generate and send invoices effortlessly, and gain insights to make informed business decisions.
landing.improvedCustomerExperience: Improved Customer Experience: Build and maintain detailed customer profiles, including preferences and booking history. Use this data to provide personalized service, leading to higher customer satisfaction and loyalty.
landing.scalabilityFlexibility: Scalability and Flexibility: Aviafy grows with your business. Whether you‚Äôre a small agency or a large enterprise, our platform adapts to your needs, supporting multiple agents and complex operations without additional infrastructure.
landing.seamlessIntegration: Seamless Integration: Connect Aviafy with your preferred communication channels like Facebook Messenger and WhatsApp. Engage with customers on platforms they are comfortable with, making communication seamless and convenient.
landing.dataDrivenInsights: Data-Driven Insights: Use the data collected by Aviafy to gain valuable insights into customer behavior, booking trends, and financial performance. Make strategic decisions based on comprehensive, real-time information.
landing.costEffectiveSolution: Cost-Effective Solution: Reduce operational costs by automating tasks and minimizing the need for manual work. The Aviafy Chat Bot is free to use, helping you provide top-notch customer support without additional expenses.
landing.easyImplementation: Easy Implementation: Get started with Aviafy in minutes. The user-friendly interface and customization options make it easy to integrate into your existing workflow and tailor it to your agency‚Äôs unique needs.
landing.teamCollaboration: Team Collaboration: Facilitate better communication and collaboration within your team. Agents can work together on bookings and customer requests, while super admins have full control and visibility over all operations.
landing.advancedEncryption: üîí Advanced Encryption: All data transmitted and stored on Myaviafy.com is protected using industry-leading encryption protocols (AES-256). This ensures that sensitive information remains confidential and secure from unauthorized access.
landing.secureDataStorage: üîê Secure Data Storage: We utilize secure, scalable cloud infrastructure with multiple layers of physical and digital security to protect your data against breaches and loss. Regular backups and redundancy measures guarantee data integrity and availability.
landing.gdprCompliant: üåê GDPR Compliant: Myaviafy.com adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), ensuring that personal data is handled with the highest standards of privacy and protection for our European users.
landing.roleBasedAccess: üë• Role-Based Access: Manage user permissions with role-based access controls, ensuring that team members only have access to the information necessary for their roles. This minimizes the risk of internal data breaches.
landing.realTimeThreatDetection: üîç Real-Time Threat Detection: Our security systems continuously monitor for suspicious activities and potential threats, enabling swift responses to protect your data.
landing.builtInPrivacy: üõ†Ô∏è Built-In Privacy Features: Privacy is integrated into every aspect of Myaviafy.com‚Äôs design and functionality. From data minimization to user consent management, we ensure that your privacy needs are met seamlessly.
landing.reliableBackup: ‚ö° Reliable Backup Systems: We maintain regular backups and have robust disaster recovery plans in place to ensure that your data is always safe and that your operations can continue without interruption in the event of an unforeseen incident.
landing.highAvailability: üïí High Availability: Our infrastructure is designed for high availability, ensuring that Myaviafy.com remains accessible and operational 24/7, so your business never misses a beat.
landing.commitmentExcellence: Commitment to Excellence: At Myaviafy.com, we are dedicated to maintaining the highest standards of security and compliance. Our ongoing investments in security technologies and adherence to global regulations reflect our commitment to protecting your business and your customers.

footer.joinAgencies: Join the many travel agencies that have accelerated their operations with Aviafy.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.intro: Welcome to Aviafy! Please read these Terms of Use carefully before using our platform.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the Aviafy platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

changes.title: 2. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of the information they provide and for maintaining the confidentiality of their account details.

termination.title: 4. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our platform at any time, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users of the platform.

governingLaw.title: 5. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Georgia, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Aviafy, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

infoCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
infoCollection.content: We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account, make a booking, or contact our support team.

infoUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
infoUsage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

infoSharing.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
infoSharing.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except as necessary to provide our services or comply with legal requirements.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

contactUs.title: 5. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@aviafy.com.

validations.passwordInvalid: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, and a number
